Arrange the following series of numbers in ascending order: 
7, 12, 3, 18, 5, 21, 1, 9, 15, 10, 6
Hint: The solution to this puzzle is a sequence of numbers in ascending order.

To arrange the series of numbers in ascending order, you simply need to sort them from the smallest to the largest. Here is the arranged sequence:

1, 3, 5, 6, 7, 9, 10, 12, 15, 18, 21
